text: Lawyer Marzell Milloy (born November 14, 1973 ) is a retired American football player. He was drafted by the New England Patriots of the National Football League in 1996. He last played in 2010. Milloy also played for the Buffalo Bills, Atlanta Falcons and Seattle Seahawks. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:New England Patriots players Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Living people Category:1973 births
title: Lawyer Milloy
